amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-374 to require a study on how the quality-adjusted life year measure negatively impacts individuals with intellectual and developmental disabilities and their access to care.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
